description: This file defines the ApiError class, which represents a standardized error response body in a web application, including fields such as code, message, timestamp, and path.

classes.name: ApiError
classes.description: A class representing a standardized API error response, including error code, message, timestamp, and request path.

methods.name: ApiError
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for ApiError, initializes code, message, timestamp to now, and path.

methods.name: getTimestamp
methods.description: Returns the timestamp of the error.

methods.name: getPath
methods.description: Returns the request path related to the error.
